mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply ( idx, num, content, writer, day, ip ) Values ( reply_seq.nextval, #{num}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{ip} )
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set content =#{content} , updater =#{writer} , updatedate = sysdate Where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: Select * from tbl_reply Where num = #{num} order by idx desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_reply WHERE num IN ( SELECT num FROM ( SELECT r.num, b.parentnum FROM tbl_reply r, tbl_board b WHERE r.num = b.num START WITH r.num = #{num} CONNECT BY b.parentnum = PRIOR r.num ) )
